mapper.select: SELECT t.theaterIdx, t.theaterName, t.theaterRegion, s.screenIdx, s.screenName FROM theater t LEFT JOIN screen s ON t.theaterIdx = s.theaterIdx ORDER BY t.theaterIdx, s.screenIdx;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timetable ( movieIdx, theaterIdx, screenIdx, timetableStartTime, timetableEndTime ) VALUES ( #{movieIdx}, #{theaterIdx}, #{screenIdx}, #{timetableStartTime}, #{timetableEndTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT screenIdx FROM screen WHERE theaterIdx = #{theaterIdx} AND screenType = #{screenType} AND screenStatus = 0 ORDER BY screenIdx LIMIT 1
